mapper.select:
select
from kpi_fixed
date_format(attendance_month, '%Y-%m') = #{toMonth}
order by compute_status , user_code

SELECT du.u_id, du.user_code, du.user_name, ka.attendance_month, dp.position_score, dd.degree_score, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, du.seniority, CURDATE()) as seniority, du.jc_id as jc_sum, CAST( TRUNCATE(CAST(ka.attendance_day AS DECIMAL) / CAST(ka.month_day AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ), 11 ) AS DECIMAL(11, 6) ) AS percentage, dj.job_gs, dj.job_ratio FROM dict_user du LEFT JOIN kpi_attendance ka ON ka.user_code = du.user_code LEFT JOIN dict_position dp ON dp.p_id = du.p_id LEFT JOIN dict_degree dd ON dd.d_id = du.d_id LEFT JOIN dict_job dj ON dj.j_id = du.j_id WHERE date_format(ka.attendance_month, '%Y-%m') = date_format(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') order by du.create_time

select
from kpi_fixed where date_format(attendance_month, '%Y-%m') = #{format} order by user_code

SELECT du.u_id, du.user_code, du.user_name, ka.attendance_month, dp.position_score, dd.degree_score, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, du.seniority, CURDATE()) as seniority, du.jc_id as jc_sum, CAST( TRUNCATE(CAST(ka.attendance_day AS DECIMAL) / CAST(ka.month_day AS DECIMAL(5, 2) ), 4 ) AS DECIMAL(5, 4) ) AS percentage, dj.job_gs, dj.job_ratio FROM dict_user du LEFT JOIN kpi_attendance ka ON ka.user_code = du.user_code LEFT JOIN dict_position dp ON dp.p_id = du.p_id LEFT JOIN dict_degree dd ON dd.d_id = du.d_id LEFT JOIN dict_job dj ON dj.j_id = du.j_id WHERE date_format(ka.attendance_month, '%Y-%m') = date_format(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') and du.user_code =#{userCode} order by du.create_time desc
